all_items.summary: Ever wonder how much electricity you’re using when you prompt, or thank, an AI model? Hugging Face engineer Julien Delavande did, so he built a tool to help arrive at the answer. AI models consume energy each time they’re run. They’re run on GPUs and specialized chips that need a l

all_items.title: Is that really your boss calling? Jericho Security raises $15M to stop deepfake fraud that’s cost businesses $200M in 2025 alone
all_items.summary: Pentagon-backed Jericho Security raises $15 million to combat deepfake fraud that has already cost North American businesses $200 million in 2025, using AI to detect increasingly convincing voice and video impersonations.

all_items.title: Intel’s new CEO signals streamlining efforts but does not spell out exact layoff numbers
all_items.summary: Lip-Bu Tan, the new CEO of Intel, sent out a blunt message to employees saying the company has to reorganize to be more efficient.

all_items.title: Zencoder buys Machinet to challenge GitHub Copilot as AI coding assistant consolidation accelerates
all_items.summary: Zencoder acquires Machinet to strengthen its position in the rapidly consolidating AI coding assistant market, expanding its JetBrains ecosystem integration while outperforming competitors like GitHub Copilot with innovative features such as Repo Grokking and Coffee Mode.

all_items.title: Ethically trained AI startup Pleias releases new small reasoning models optimized for RAG with built-in citations
all_items.summary: Pleias emphasizes the models’ suitability for integration into search-augmented assistants, educational tools, and user support systems.
